tow.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to pull a vehicle or ship along behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain
tow.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The ship had to be towed into the harbor.
Our car had been towed away.
tow.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: an act of pulling a vehicle behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain
tow.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Can you give us a tow to the garage?
